comments.comment: I been thinking about the USB A port... What is the charging spec for this port? 😇
Hello there! No comments at all, not even from the creator. 🤔
But i love this charger, you guys are many step ahead! What is the messure and weight on this charger? Does it comes with two different color? I see pictures of grey and black devices?
Good input! I learn that the heat is, or can be a problem with high output in small/compact devices. So i wondering what temp do this charger reach after a longer charging with high output? 🙏🙏🙏
if the charger is small size, and heat generation is an important issue that most charging devices need to consider. This can also test the charger from design structure to materials.

In fact, Our this super 240W charger has multiple heat dissipation designs, including the use of the latest GaN chip technology, large-area heat dissipation silicone injection and aluminum alloy shell, which can dissipate heat efficiently.

At the same time, built in multiple protections , including over-temperature protection, so this charger does not need to consider the heat generation issue too much when charging at high power and speed.
Thank's for great info! I been waiting for a charger like this for a while, the power need are so much higher today than just a few years ago. Amazing device i must say! 😇
